name: STMT_ETR_DETAIL
description: This table stores information about Professional Billing transactions that are associated with a given statement.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The Professional Billing transaction ID.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID for the transaction.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID for the transaction.

columns.name: PAYER_ID
columns.description: The payer ID for the transaction.

columns.name: IS_ASSIGNED_TO_PAYER_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the transaction is assigned to a payer.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The transaction post date.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The transaction service date.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The transaction description.

columns.name: UNIT
columns.description: The transaction units.

columns.name: AMT_DUE
columns.description: The transaction due amount.

columns.name: DEBIT_ORIG_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing debit original amount.

columns.name: CREDIT_ORIG_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing credit original amount.

columns.name: DEBIT_HOLD_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing debit hold amount.

columns.name: CREDIT_HOLD_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing credit hold amount.

columns.name: ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing adjustment amount.

columns.name: MATCH_TX_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing matching transaction insurance payment amount.

columns.name: MATCH_TX_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing matching transaction patient payment amount.

columns.name: MATCH_TX_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing matching transaction adjustment amount.

columns.name: NOTES
columns.description: The Professional Billing notes.

columns.name: HOLD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The Professional Billing hold status.

columns.name: IS_NEW_TX_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not this is a new transaction.

columns.name: INS_AMT
columns.description: Insurance balance of a debit transaction.

columns.name: PAT_AMT
columns.description: Patient amount of a debit transaction.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID for this professional transaction.

columns.name: PURCHASE_SVC_AMT
columns.description: The purchased service amount.

columns.name: PURCHASE_SVC_POS
columns.description: The purchased service place of service name.
